title: Add GitHub Copilot configuration files
body:
## Summary

Adds configuration files for GitHub Copilot to improve AI-assisted development in this repository.

## Changes

### `.github/copilot-instructions.md`
- Build, test, and lint commands (including single test execution)
- Architecture overview of the two main libraries
- Key conventions:
  - `SK` prefix naming for controls
  - `.shared.cs` file naming pattern for cross-platform code
  - `TemplatedView` + `ResourceLoader<T>` control pattern
  - `SKAnimatedSurfaceView` animation inheritance pattern
- Dependencies reference

### `.github/workflows/copilot-setup-steps.yml`
- Copilot coding agent environment setup workflow
- Installs .NET 9 and MAUI Android workload
- Restores dependencies and local tools (Cake)
- Verifies both core library and MAUI library builds

## Notes
- Reviewed by 5 AI models (Claude Sonnet, Claude Opus, Claude Haiku, GPT-5.1, Gemini 3 Pro) to validate accuracy
- Workflow follows official GitHub Copilot coding agent documentation for `copilot-setup-steps.yml` structure
